evidence.claim: By Design Systems leverages AWS for cloud services including Lambda, EC2, and S3.
The company refers to FHIR and HL7 standards in their health-tech integrations.
Integration patterns include API-driven and event-driven architecture to streamline data flow.
References to X12 and EDI transactions indicate compliance with healthcare data exchange standards.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards for healthcare data exchange and is API-driven.
